channel.title: [Delta] Edge4Pk V2! | Achievements | Starters kits | Control panel | V2
channel.description:
V2 got all things from V1 as well. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509568.0.html]Edge4Pk V1 Topic click here[/url] [center][size=14pt][b]Edge4Pk V2[/b][/size] Hello, I finally finish'd coding V2! It is not tons of new stuff, Just some cool stuff. I will only post picture's of the new things I coded, If you want to see more please go to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509568.0.html]The topic of Edge4Pk V1[/url]
[b]Download links[/b]
[url=http://up.ht/mSD5PA][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jshchz.jpg[/img] Download client[/url] [url=http://up.ht/nGh6UH][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jshchz.jpg[/img] Download server[/url]
______________________________________________________________________________ [b]Control Panel.[/b] I have build a Control panel into Edge4Pk, The hoster can do alot of things without being online.
Some picture's : [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/24awkdc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rshq4j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2nqfn94.jpg[/img]
Include : Ban, Kick, PM, Teleport, Get ID, Add item, Remove item, Open bank, Empty invertory, Force emote, Force gfx, Give XP, Force interface Give master, Kill player, Unlimited HP, Make all stats 1 of the 99, Complete all the achievements, Give mod, Give Pkpoints, Send message to hole server, Update the server, Player count
You can use this by every player that is online! ______________________________________________________________________________ [b]Melee/Range set.[/b] If a player logs in for the first time, He can choose between Melee and Range sets, Those sets are not rare and you can spawn them from the quest tab. It just looks good for players that login for the first time.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mpbclj.jpg[/img]
I also added more lines for the normal login message.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29ff9fb.jpg[/img] ______________________________________________________________________________ [b]Achievements.[/b] I added 10 achievements, You can look at the achievements by clicking on the link in the quest tab! When you done one achievement you always get a message in your chatbox, And the achievement text colour in the achievement list will be green.
Achievements are : Login for the first time, Getting 100 kills, Getting 1000 kills, Earn 50 activity points, Earn 100 activity points, Defeat the Ice queen, Set a bank pin, Kill the KBD in the quest, View the staff list, Complete all the achievements.
When you done all the achievements you can do ::reward, This will give you a random party hat and your player name will be wroten in a file in the folder config.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/w178mo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/71my2p.jpg[/img] ______________________________________________________________________________ [b]Green and yellow text colourd items.[/b] You notice that rare items will have a green text colour and admin items will have a yellow text colour. I added this so you can see whats rare, You will also detect rare items in loots faster.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/dlhytx.jpg[/img] ______________________________________________________________________________ [b]Donator quest tab.[/b] I maded a donator quest tab, If you are a donator you can click on a button in the quest tab, When you click it you get a disconnect (You cant use it in wildy) and you will come back ingame with a new quest tab!
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/wkgxo8.jpg[/img]
This new quest tab is pretty basic, You can open your bank (Not in the wildy) for 2 Pkpoints, Ofcourse if you have more idea's just add them :D _____________________________________________________________________________ [b]New activity shop items.[/b] Added some new activity shop items
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/20rmviv.jpg[/img] _____________________________________________________________________________ [b]Credits[/b]
YouriDudock Demise Rog3r (For the control panel basic code) Yoeri (For supporting me and give me idea's)
That was pretty much it! I fixed few glitches, Not so much. I dont think that I be working on a V3, Hope you enjoy it!
[b]Youri Dudock.[/b] [/center]

@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:117, topic:414763”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=516722.msg4418790#msg4418790 date=1397387245]
Everyone asking for links and pming me asking for links… I dont got the source anymore been ages. Just let this die in peace :3
[/quote]
YOU’RE ALIVE?![/quote]

Always been, still into RsPs. Just never really on my account because I dont really bother with replying etc and forgot my password for a while until I decided to reset it.

Also noticing less activity then there was before sadly… so when I do got a question I mostly visit other forums .

Also gratz on your award man, know u had it for a while but never said it haha.
Well deserved.

Read full topic
